about_the_game:
Did you like the music tracks that set the mood in GrandMa Badass?
All styles of music are present in the game, from Reggae to classical, passing by Rock and scary music.
Find in this album the OST of the game and relive the good moments you spent on the game thanks to these unusual sounds.
detailed_description:
Did you like the music tracks that set the mood in GrandMa Badass?
All styles of music are present in the game, from Reggae to classical, passing by Rock and scary music.
Find in this album the OST of the game and relive the good moments you spent on the game thanks to these unusual sounds.
